column5: Woodland West Gardens - Great place to relax and unwind after the day's adventures enjoying the large garden patio, Koi pond and hot tub or cooling off inside at the 8-ft Brazilian dining table. Central Arlington, cozy, wooded neighborhood. Neighborhood park 3 minutes away. UTA - 4 miles, AT&T stadium, Ranger Stadium, Six Flags, Hurricane Harbor - 6 miles. Downtown Fort Worth - 13 miles, DFW airport - 19 miles.
